name: Sunken Treasure | Deep Sea Tours
description:
Submarine Piloting Instructions

Don't worry, you don't need to be a licensed pilot to drive a Sunken Treasures Submarine! They're very easy to use!

- WASD to Move

- Space to Scan Fish and Advance Dialogue

- Space or Enter to Respawn after dying
      or hold R to Respawn anytime

- Hold P to skip dialog.

- ESC to Pause and adjust Volume or Screenshake settings 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Warning!!! WebGL version crashes at the very end. 
However, you'll only miss seeing the final credits ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Under sea life like you've never seen before! 

Sunken Treasures Deep Sea Tours bring the ocean to you with the world's first personal submarine tour!

Through the window of a Sunken Treasure's Submarine:

WITNESS undersea life in its natural, peaceful state.

BEFRIEND the joyful sea creatures of the depths with innovative communication technology! 

REMEMBER this once in a lifetime experience with Sunken Treasures brand souvenirs, availiable in the  GIFT SHOP (additional fees apply)

ENJOY some of the worlds finest pizza!!

BOOK NOW for just $1245.50!

(Or like... you know,  just hit "Run game!" for free)

Known Bugs (Semi-Spoiler Warning!!!)   

Help improve the game by posting your bugs :D 

  • Game Crashes at Credits Sequence
  • Dialogue writes over itself during chase
  • Angler fish pushing sub outside the boundaries
  • Eels bounce around if hit from above/below
  • Invisible wall that should be visible near the end
  • Talking to Electric Eel twice causes a hardlock
  • Pause Menu is uncloseable at times
Post Jam Wishlist

Feel free to give your suggestions in the comments!

  • Less angler fish
  • More sound fx during the final sequence
  • Rubberbanding / more obstacles during the chasing to help with pacing
  • Sound balancing
  • Different dialogue typing sounds
  • WebGL Optimizations
Credits

wait, what credits? Who else would there be other than Sunken Treasures Tour Company... and me of course

(Get back behind the 4th wall, Scubot. The game devs still gotta get credit!)
